data.message: Man eminem sold out I respect the older eminem with the older albums but the newer one are shit I know there is a lot of computation out there but that's when u show then who is the RAP GOD u were is slim shady l.p. and encore and certain calls the hit but man recovery was funny and real shit there hope I still have some game left in u eminem I no longer listen to rap when I do it's the older eminem but now it's tech or dubstep like my comment if you think is true get the truth out there
